Author: Alterily
Text: I just wanted to say I really feel you, I god just like wanting to be left alone, like it is my body and my life, I feel you.   The only small bit of advice that I do have is that is there something that you can do that you really enjoy that you do for yourself, like is there any way you can try to get like even 15 minutes a day (or 15minutes more) of doing something for yourself that no one can take away and you donâ€™t have to do for anyone else, I just found that helpful when I was in similar situations, might not work for you
